languages.text: "Да, я должен был обменяться с флагманом шифрованной передачей, чтобы идентифицировать корабль и его владе{mf|льца|лицу}. Мне пришлось залезть глубоко в судовые каналы связи и бортовые системы, чтобы идентифицировать личность нового Лорд-капитана и твое право им быть".

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."
languages.original_text: "Да, я должен был обменяться с флагманом шифрованной передачей, чтобы идентифицировать корабль и его владе{mf|льца|лицу}. Мне пришлось залезть глубоко в судовые каналы связи и бортовые системы, чтобы идентифицировать личность нового Лорд-капитана и твое право им быть".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

"Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

languages.text: «Sí, debía intercambiar códigos con la nave insignia para identificar la nave y a su propietari{mf|o|a}. Tuve que pasar por distintos canales y sistemas de comunicación de a bordo para verificar los datos de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán y su derecho al título».
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, debía intercambiar códigos con la nave insignia para identificar la nave y a su propietari{mf|o|a}. Tuve que pasar por distintos canales y sistemas de comunicación de a bordo para verificar los datos de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán y su derecho al título».

languages.text: “是的，我必须与旗舰交换访问密码，才能确认舰船与所有者的身份。当时，我不得不筛选船上的通信渠道与各个系统，才能核实新任领主舰长的相关数据，以及身为领主舰长的权利。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: “是的，我必须与旗舰交换访问密码，才能确认舰船与所有者的身份。当时，我不得不筛选船上的通信渠道与各个系统，才能核实新任领主舰长的相关数据，以及身为领主舰长的权利。”

languages.text: 「そうだ。船とその所有者を特定するために旗艦とコードを交換する必要があった。私は船上の通信チャネルとシステムを調べ上げて、新たなロード・キャプテンのデータと権限がそれであることを確認しなければならなかった」
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。船とその所有者を特定するために旗艦とコードを交換する必要があった。私は船上の通信チャネルとシステムを調べ上げて、新たなロード・キャプテンのデータと権限がそれであることを確認しなければならなかった」

languages.text: "Ja, ich musste Codes mit dem Flaggschiff austauschen, um das Schiff und seinen Besitzer zu identifizieren. Ich musste die Kommunikationskanäle und -systeme an Bord durchsuchen, um die Daten des neuen Lord Captains und {mf|sein|ihr} Recht auf diesen Titel zu verifizieren."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, ich musste Codes mit dem Flaggschiff austauschen, um das Schiff und seinen Besitzer zu identifizieren. Ich musste die Kommunikationskanäle und -systeme an Bord durchsuchen, um die Daten des neuen Lord Captains und {mf|sein|ihr} Recht auf diesen Titel zu verifizieren."

languages.text: « Oui, je devais échanger certains codes avec le vaisseau amiral afin de les identifier, lui et {mf|son|sa} propriétaire. Il m'a fallu parcourir les canaux et systèmes de communication embarqués pour vérifier les données {mf|du nouveau seigneur-capitaine|de la nouvelle seigneure-capitaine} et m'assurer de sa légitimité. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, je devais échanger certains codes avec le vaisseau amiral afin de les identifier, lui et {mf|son|sa} propriétaire. Il m'a fallu parcourir les canaux et systèmes de communication embarqués pour vérifier les données {mf|du nouveau seigneur-capitaine|de la nouvelle seigneure-capitaine} et m'assurer de sa légitimité. »

languages.text: "Evet. Gemiyi ve sahibini tanımlamak için sancak gemisiyle kod alışverişi yapmam gerekiyordu. Yeni Lord Kaptan'ın verilerini ve Lord Kaptanlık hakkını doğrulamak için gemideki iletişim kanallarını ve sistemlerini gözden geçirmem gerekti."
languages.original_text: "Yes, I needed to exchange codes with the flagship in order to identify the vessel and its owner. I had to sift through onboard communication channels and systems to verify the new Lord Captain's data and {mf|his|her} right to be one."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Gemiyi ve sahibini tanımlamak için sancak gemisiyle kod alışverişi yapmam gerekiyordu. Yeni Lord Kaptan'ın verilerini ve Lord Kaptanlık hakkını doğrulamak için gemideki iletişim kanallarını ve sistemlerini gözden geçirmem gerekti."
